<p>Scope analysis does not provide support for undeclared variables.</p><p><em>0</em> instances of <strong>missing semicolons</strong> counted.</p><p><em>0</em> unnecessary instances of the keyword <strong>new</strong> counted.</p><div class="beautify" data-prettydiff-ignore="true"><ol class="count"><li class="fold" title="folds from line 1 to line 7">-1</li><li class="fold" title="folds from line 2 to line 4">-2</li><li>3</li><li>4</li><li>5</li><li>6</li><li>7</li></ol>
